JobFullDesc: The Facebook Product Support Operations Integrity and Risk Launches Team provides project management support that bridges the gap between Product, Policy, Engineering, and Community Operations to address some of Facebook’s most complex cross-functional projects. The Product Integrity and Risk Launches Team drives the integrity strategy for all new user-facing products that launch across the Facebook suite of apps. The Product Integrity Program Manager will lead a subset of our new product portfolio and ensure that all products launch with integrity measures in place to protect our end users. The ideal candidate will be a detail-oriented, execution-minded professional who can think strategically, adapt quickly, and rapidly earn credibility and trust within all levels of the organization. This person should have demonstrated experience influencing large cross-functional teams and leading multi-disciplinary conversations. They will be at the cutting edge of defining integrity standards and efficient launch strategies within their space and should have significant comfort and experience driving clarity with ambiguous problem statements. Given the speed at which products launch, this person should also be highly organized, efficiency-minded, poised, and able to thrive in high-pressure, time-sensitive scenarios.Lead large, complex,
